title: Environmental Development & Sustainability Inc.
content: 2003. EDS is a corporation registered in Puerto Rico. It is a women-owned and small business enterprise. (Cage No. 3GKN6. DUNS No. 131643897. Primary NAICS Code: 541620).
Its leaders have more than 35 years of shared national and international experience in the environmental field.
EDS is an environmental consultant dedicated to providing support to its clients to improve their environmental performance and relationship with local communities to attain sustainable development.
EDS offers services in Puerto Rico to the private and public sectors.
